text:
The httpd configure script defines SINGLE_LISTEN_UNSERIALIZED_ACCEPT if the host type is linux and `uname -r` matches 2.[2-9].

This fails to match linux 3.x, which I believe should have SINGLE_LISTEN_UNSERIALIZED_ACCEPT defined.
creator: apache@heilbrun.org
apache@heilbrun.org
text:
Created attachment 30464
Define SINGLE_LISTEN_UNSERIALIZED_ACCEPT for all linux versions after 2.1.
committed to httpd trunk with r1496429...  I'll propose it for backport to 2.4.x and 2.2.x...
creator: trawick@apache.org

text:
in 2.4.x branch with r1496916 (in httpd 2.4.6 release)
in 2.2.x branch with r1497443 (in httpd 2.2.25 release)
creator: trawick@apache.org
